findings.message:
Reentrancy in WalletLibrary.confirm (parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#279-293):
	External calls:
	- ! m_txs[_h].to.call.value(m_txs[_h].value)(m_txs[_h].data) (parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#285-286)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- m_txs (parity_wallet_bug_2.sol#290)
findings.name: reentrancy-eth
